des: "This is a wonderful spread I learned to make while working at an herb farm. It is a favorite at gatherings and parties. Serve it with crackers or gourmet breads."
ins: Combine the fresh sage and garlic in the container of a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped. In a small bowl, blend together the cream cheese and lemonade concentrate. Stir in the garlic and sage. Cover and refrigerate for at least one day before serving for best flavor.
